meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Susan MacKay Smith Andy Axel Karen Ash Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7006.

td.p: Susan MacKay Smith, a writer from Boulder, Colorado
Andy Axel, a graduate student in poetry from Iowa City, Iowa
Karen Ash, a business analyst from Brooklyn, New York (whose 2-day cash winnings total $49,600)

tr.td: MR. CATEGORY
DOUBLE-LETTER SCIENCE
THIS & THAT
HIT MEN
OH, TOO SOON?!
NICE "SHOE"S

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
